message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $175. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $120 is a bit lower than what I'm looking for, I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet the price of $140. I am willing to pay up to $130 for it. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
